comments:
Details:
An error pop up by Preview Output Parameter in edit dataset

Setp:
1.New a report, create a sample datasource.
2.Input "select *  from offices"
3.Select Preview Output Parameter

An error pop up.

*** Bug 121989 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
